subject: Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Sir,
My name is Mr. Kenneth owusu  ,I work for a zoological/Veterinary
services company here in Ghana, our company is in need of a product
(Epokoh roots product) raw material, our company ran out of stock of
this product which is a raw material required to mix some vaccines to
obtain end product (feed supplement) to supply to the Government who
awarded the contract to our company to deliver and distribute the feed
supplement to other states,regions and districts in the country for
Agriculture purposes.
Following some issues between our company and the purchasing manager
on purchase of some other products, for obvious reasons he decided to
quit and resigned his job and went further to established a separate
company of his own with the profits he made out of the purchase of
this product to our the company, he was then in full charge of the
department of all procurement of materials and products for the
company.
That former purchasing manager was the head of my department in the
company and my direct boss before he quit his job as the company
purchasing manager,he made the company to believe that the product is
ordered at the rate of$32,860 USD per Gallon, following his
resignation, I was appointed as the interim or temporary purchasing
manager in charge of the same department recently
I managed to discover that the same product is supplied to him by the
dealers at the rate of USD $18,500 per Gallon, which he delivers to
our company at the rate of $32,860 USD making a huge amount of profits
for himself. As a matter of fact, I do not wish to let anyone in our
company know about this because of my interest to make some profits
with this opportunity.
Listen, the deal here now is that I intend to present you as the
supplier so you will be a middleman between our company and the local
based dealer of the product if you’re willing to cooperate and follow
the procedures accordingly, so that our company will not know the
main-source of the product or the dealer but to deal with you directly
as the supplier.
Please if you’re interested and ready to do this business as informed
kindly forward to me your full name,country of origin and contact cell
phone number to enable me to forward to you details and contact of the
local base dealer of the product to enable you to contact and
negotiate to purchase and supply the product, if you’re able to
convince our company that you’re the supplier and can supply the
product, our company is ready to make advance payment to you to supply
the product at any quantity the company may order, usually 500 gallons
at the minimum.
Hence you can make use of the upfront or advance payment to mobilize
and order the total quantity of the product ordered from the local
dealer to be delivered to anyone our company will send to your country
to engage the transaction with you as the supplier (FOB) and balance
payment will be made to you at the point of delivery of the product
there in your country.
However, the profit will be shared among the both of us at the close
of the deal, 70% for you and 30% for me, after deduction of any
expenses you may have incurred during the transaction processes.
This deal will be a long term business between you and our company if
you’re able to convince and handle the transaction professionally as a
direct supplier and deliver successfully.
Feel free to ask any question of interest where you’re not cleared, in
every successful partnership business, trust and respect among parties
involved is priority or key to the success.
I look forward to your positive response as soon as possible to
proceed with this deal as the company needs the Product urgently.
Also Kindly send me your Mob./WhatsApp number to enhance and
facilitate communication effectively to avoid delay.
Thanks and best regards
Mr. Kenneth owusu

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Owusu,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite interesting. I would like to learn more about the Epokoh roots product and how it is used in the production of vaccines and feed supplements. Could you please provide me with some more information on that?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the local-based dealer of the product. Are they a reputable supplier? Have they been in business for a long time? It's important for me to ensure that we are dealing with reliable partners.

Furthermore, could you clarify how the profit sharing would work? What percentage of the profits would be allocated to each party involved? And what expenses might I incur during the process?

I appreciate your understanding and willingness to answer my questions. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Mr Chris,
Good sir and thanks for the reply.
No.1, Sir when you contact the Indian local-based dealer of the product and
made an inquiry of the product availability in stock ,I believe they will
forward to you the product quotation/specification, therein you will
understand better about the natural herbal /roots components of Epokoh
roots product.

No.2, The product is not used for production of vaccines and feed
supplements sir, rather our company uses the product to mix vaccines for
procurement of feed supplements/treatment of pet animals and some other
agricultural purposes.

No.3, Here are the local-based dealer of the product contact details :
Name: Ram Traders.
Contact person: Arya Ram Singh
Mob. number: +919987527971
E-mail: contact@asiaundpprogram.org ( or ) ramtraders388@gmail.com
Website: www.asiaundpprogram.org
Address:36A Garden City Anil Badhwa Industrial Estate Bareilly Uttar
Pradesh 243122 India.

You can contact them and make inquiry if the product is available in stock,
their current price per gallon of 5 liters container and procedures to
deliver the product locally in India upon order because they usually
transact FoB, And they're reputable dealers/suppliers by all standards. Of
course I am sure they've been in business for a long time, I can assure you
100% that we are dealing with reliable partners.

Furthermore, how the profit sharing would work is that if after convincing
our company that you're the main supplier of the product in India, our
company wires up to 70 to 80 Percent of the total cost of quantity ordered
from you as initial or down payment to product and supply the product, when
the product is ready for delivery as will be confirmed by the company's
purchasing manager who will also fly and meet with you in India, the
balance payment will be transferred to your account, received and confirmed
by your bank, then you deliver the product to the purchasing manager there
in India and he makes the shipment down to our country.

So at the close of the transaction, i mean when you've delivered the
product, the profit margin will be shared 70% for you and 30% for me and we
wait for another order in three months which i will communicate with you.

Normally there's not much expenses you will incur as the supplier, But for
clarity sake if you're not in India i think it's necessary and important
you will travel to India after successful signing the supply contract with
our company and probably our company may request for the product sample for
testing of product quality before wiring the advance payment of the
quantity ordered, the company sometimes instructs the purchasing manager to
have a sample of the product from you upon meeting with you in India as the
supplier, Then you will provide the sample for his testing of quality in
your presence and confirms the test result to you and our company, if the
quality after testing proves satisfactory according to the company's
standard, the company will immediately make an advance or down payment as i
stated above while the purchasing manager waits to take delivery when it's
ready.

So what you will do is immediately you receive the advance payment, you
quickly transfer payment to the local dealer for the same quantity
according to their price quote and wait for the delivery there in India,
once it is delivered to you then you inform the company's purchasing
manager and your balance will be paid and he takes over the product, that's
all. This transaction could be transacted and completed in just 2 weeks and
everyone will be happy.

I hope this answers will help and put you in the right direction to proceed
with the transaction accordingly, if you do have any other question you can
kindly forward your question where you're not cleared to enable me to
provide you with the notable answer to proceed. Thank you and God bless.
Kindly provide me with your contact phone number to enable us to
communicate effectively.
Have a great weekend with your family.
Regards.
Mr Kenneth Owusuh. contact phone number...+233246685790

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Owusuh,

Thank you for providing me with all the information about the Epokoh roots product. I appreciate your detailed explanation of how the profit sharing would work and the process of delivering the product. It's good to know that your company has reliable partners in India.

I have a few follow-up questions regarding the product. Could you please clarify what specific purposes the product is used for, apart from mixing vaccines for pet animals? Also, could you provide more details about the natural herbal roots components of Epokoh roots product?

Additionally, I would like to know if there are any specific certifications or quality standards that your company adheres to when it comes to this product. It's important for me to ensure that the product meets all necessary requirements.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear Mr Chris,
Thanks for your reply and good questions.
Moving forward, Our company is a veterinary/service company, sir, the
product is used to mix vaccines specifically for the purposes of feed
supplement for pet animals and also for treatments of some diseases and it
can be used also for other Agricultural farm treatments such as Cocoa farm,
Cotton farm etc..

Like i said in my previous email reply, you can find more details about the
natural herbal roots components of Epokoh roots product on the product
quotation/specification the local dealer of the product in India will
forward to you upon contacting and making inquiries and product price and
delivery procedures there in India. The price quotation/specification will
help you to know more about the natural herbal roots components of Epokoh
roots product sir.

Sir, the only certification is your product quotation/specification which
you can only change the price of the Indian local dealer to your own price
offer to the buying company and the specification remains the same with
that of the Indian local dealer.

Secondly the quality standards our company adheres to when it comes to this
product is determined by the test result of the product sample which the
visiting purchasing manager will meet with you personally and you provide
at least one gallon of the product for the test of quality to ascertain
quality standards of your product.

I think It's important for you to follow my answers that will help you and
ensure that the product meets all necessary requirements for the supply to
the buying company. Thank you.
I requested for your phone number in my previous email and you did not
bothered to provide it in this reply? Anyway i look forward to your
feedback as soon as you contact the Indian local dealer and receive the
quotation/specification to proceed with the supply process.
Regards.
Mr. Kenneth Owusuh

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear Mr Chris,
Thanks for your reply and good questions.

product is used to mix vaccines specifically for the purposes of feed

I requested your phone number in my previous email and you did not bother
to provide it in this reply? Anyway I look forward to your feedback as soon
as you contact the Indian local dealer and receive the
quotation/specification to proceed with the supply process.
Regards.
Mr. Kenneth Owusuh

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear Mr. Kenneth Owusuh,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing more information about your company and the product. It's interesting to learn that the product can be used for various purposes, including as a feed supplement for pet animals and for treating diseases in farm animals.

I appreciate your suggestion to contact the local dealer in India to inquire about the product quotation and its natural herbal roots components. I will definitely reach out to them to gather more details.

Regarding the price, you mentioned that I can change it to my own offer. Could you please clarify if there is a specific range or any guidelines I should follow when determining my price offer?

Furthermore, you mentioned that the quality standards of the product are determined by a test result of a sample. Could you provide more information about this test? How long does it usually take? And what are the specific parameters that are tested to ensure the quality standards are met?

Apologies for not providing my phone number in my previous email. I prefer to communicate via email at this stage, but if necessary, I can share my phone number with you later on.

Once again, thank you for your assistance so far. I look forward to receiving the quotation from the Indian local dealer and proceeding with the supply process.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear Mr. Kenneth Owusuh,

Thank you for providing more information about your company and the product you offer. It sounds like your veterinary service company provides a vaccine mixing product that can be used as a feed supplement for pet animals and for treating diseases in various farm settings.

I appreciate your suggestion to contact the local dealer in India to inquire about the product's natural herbal roots components. Once I receive the quotation, I will have a better understanding of the ingredients used in Epokoh roots product.

Regarding the price, am I correct in understanding that I can adjust the price offered by the Indian local dealer to my own price offer? Could you please clarify if there are any specific guidelines or limitations when it comes to setting my own price?

Furthermore, you mentioned that the quality standards of your product are determined by a test result of a sample. If I understand correctly, a visiting purchasing manager would personally meet with me to conduct this test. How much product would be required for this quality test? And what specific quality standards should we expect?

Apologies for not providing my phone number in my previous email. Here is my phone number: . Please let me know if there is any other information or steps I need to take once I receive the quotation from the Indian local dealer.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear sir,
Greetings and thanks for the mail,

Yes sir, It's better you contact the local dealer in India and inquire
about the product's natural herbal roots components to enable you to have a
better understanding of the ingredients used in Epokoh roots product.

Regarding the price, you're correct in understanding that you can adjust
the price offered by the Indian local dealer to your own price offer in
your quotation to the buying company for profit making purpose in the deal.

Sir, there's no any specific guidelines or limitations when it comes to
setting your own price.

According to the buying company's policy on procurement of goods abroad,
before any payment is made to supplier, the company will send the
purchasing manager who would personally meet with me as the supplier in the
country of production to conduct this test of sample of the product for
quality/standard purpose. The purchasing manager will be coming with the
company's small geometric testing apparatus to conduct the test in your
presence at any convenient location, office, residence or hotel.

Normally the company expects or advises for a gallon of the product or at
the worst a liter can be required for the test, the company does not pay
for the sample, you have to supply the sample as the supplier to convince
the buying company that you have the product and can supply any quantity of
their choice. The specific quality standards to expect is what will show in
the test result, if the product sample is from the recommended Indian local
dealer, trust me the result will be excellent and convincing.

The final and very important step is not to let the buying company to know
that you're not the dealer or supplier of the product, you must do
everything possible to portray and act professionally as the supplier
because the buying company does not not deal with brokers, agents or middle
persons for obvious reason of buying imitation, adulterated or fake
products as the products are in liquid contents, it entire against the
policy of the company.

You did not send the phone number yet again, you only mentioned it in the
concluding part of your message and still ommitted it, i just wondered
why....anyway you can still send it back if it's a mistake or something....

Kindly let me know when you contact the Indian local dealer and receive a
reply to enable me to guide and forward to you the buying company contact
details to contact and forward your proposal to supply the product to the
MD of the company.

Thank you.
Mr Kenneth.

subject: Re: Hello Sir,
body:
Dear Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. It's good to know that I can contact the local dealer in India to inquire about the natural herbal roots components of the product. Understanding the ingredients is important to ensure its quality.

Regarding the price, it's interesting that I can adjust it based on my own quotation to the buying company. Could you please explain how this process works? How do I determine a fair price that would be acceptable to both parties?

I also find it intriguing that the buying company sends a purchasing manager to personally conduct a test of the product for quality standards. It seems like a thorough process. Can you tell me more about this testing apparatus and what specific quality standards they are looking for?

You mentioned that supplying a sample of the product is necessary for convincing the buying company of its authenticity and your ability to supply any quantity they require. Is there any cost involved in providing this sample? And how much quantity would be needed for the test?

Lastly, I understand that it's crucial not to let the buying company know that I am not the actual supplier or dealer. Could you please provide some guidance on how I can effectively portray myself as the supplier during our interactions?

I apologize for omitting my phone number again in my previous message. It was indeed a mistake on my part. Here is my phone number: . Please let me know once you have contacted the Indian local dealer and received their reply so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Chris
